attributes.action: Investigate the BBC acceptance of EU money and if it breeches its impartiality rules.
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC received millions of pounds in EU money and loans.
See:
http://www.telegraph.co.uk/culture/tvandradio/bbc/9055183/BBC-admits-receiving-millions-in-grants-from-EU-and-councils.html
This raises questions over the impartiality of the BBC as well as being a waste of money.
